channel.title: CVE Feed for MuleSoft -- Mule CE/EE 3.x
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MuleSoft -- Mule CE/EE 3.x

item.title: CVE-2019-15631|2024-08-05T00:56:20.902Z -- mulesoft -- mule%20ce%2Fee%203.x
item.description: Remote Code Execution vulnerability in MuleSoft Mule CE/EE 3.x and API Gateway 2.x released before October 31, 2019 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
